DOC.brief_summary: The investigator wish compare efficacy patient tolerability preparation consist 2L Bi-Peglyte plus 15mg bisacodyl v standard preparation 4L Peglyte . The investigator hypothesize 2L Bi-Peglyte 15mg bisacodyl show high efficacy tolerability .
DOC.brief_title: Comparing 2L Bi-Pegyte 4L PegLyte Regiments Outpatient Colonic Preparation
